converterWidget.commonMistakesTitle: Celsius to Fahrenheit Conversion Common Mistakes

commonMistakes.title: Forgetting to add 32
commonMistakes.description: Only multiplying by 9/5 will give incorrect results

commonMistakes.title: Incorrect order of operations
commonMistakes.description: Adding 32 first and then multiplying by 9/5 is incorrect

commonMistakes.title: Using the wrong fraction
commonMistakes.description: Using 2/3 instead of 9/5 is a common error

commonMistakes.title: Rounding too early
commonMistakes.description: Rounding intermediate results can lead to inaccuracies
